At Cardiff's School of Chemistry we are focused on tackling the important scientific challenges of the 21st century.

Our collaborations with international companies help our research achieve the 12th rank in the UK for the impact of our research in addressing majar challenges.

94% of our graduates were in employment and / or further study, 15 months after the end of their course.

We offer a variety of undergraduate courses.

Our Bsc programmes provide a broad coverage of chemistry allowing those to progress to a career in chemistry or related disciplines.
Bsc Chemistry courses:
- Chemistry with optional placement year abroad or in industry
- Medicinal Chemistry

Our 4 year Master's level courses focus in more depth on selected areas, devloping the understanding and knowledge to a higher level compared to Bsc.
MChem Chemistry courses:
- Chemistry with optional placement year abroad or in industry

Postgraduate taught Masters
Our Master's courses are designed to provide training in state-of-the-art aspects of theory, practical techniques and applications.
Postgraduate taught Masters:
- Advanced Chemistry
- Medicinal Chemistry

Postgraduate research
Our research degrees give you the freedom to investigate a cutting-edge topic in depth, amongst leading researchers with truly first-class facilities.
PhD and MPhil courses:
- Catalysis in the Cardiff Catalysis Institute
- Biological Chemistry
- Chemistry
- Inorganic Chemistry
- Organic Synthesis
- Physical Organic Chemistry
- Solid State Materials
- Theoretical and Computational Chemistry
